def snail(column, day, night): 
    up = day - night
    cycle = day + night
    days = ceil((column - night) / up)
    return days

def snail(column, day, night):
    position = 0
    day_position = 0
    nights = 0
    while position < column:
        day_position += day
        position += day
        nights += 1
        while day_position > position:
            day_position -= night
            position += night
            nights += 1
    return nights

def snail(column, day, night):
    day_progress = day
    night_progress = -night
    day_night = 0

        day_progress += day
        night_progress += night
        if day_progress >= night_progress:
            column -= day_progress
            day_progress = 0

            day_progress -= night_progress

        day_night += 1
    return day_night

    night_progress = -night
